data.eml:eml: Checklist of Crickets and Katydids of Vermont, USA

Checklist to the Crickets and Katydids of Vermont derived from specimens and other observational data. All cricket species are represented by specimens in the UVM collection. The 20 Katydid species are represented in the UVM collection and one listed here is likely to be found in Vermont. One cricket and two katydid species have been introduced to Vermont. Sources: Bell, Ross. 2009. Grasshoppers and Crickets of Vermont from the UVM Insect Collection. Walker, Thomas J. and Thomas E. Moore. Singing Insects of North America. http://entnemdept.ufl.edu/walker/buzz/index.htm. Accessed 6 August 2014. Bell, Ross. 1998. Rare Vermont Grasshoppers of Vermont from the UVM Insect Collection.
